line.text: 'Milestone effects only apply to the current faction.'
'Extra maintenance cost (on top of higher base cost)'
'Needs extra Quantum Tubes but less Hull Plating and Computer Components'
'Needs fewer Quantum Tubes and Computer Components but more Hull Plating and Crystals'
'Always infected with OCV virus. Eventually turns on you and joins the Terraformers'
'Virus progression rate depends on abnormal signals in original construction sector'
'Cost discount based on abnormal signals in original construction sector'
'Research station bonus based on abnormal signals in the sector'
'Not attacked by Terraformers. Cannot attack Terraformers.'
'Needs extra Computer Components but less Hull Plating and Quantum Tubes'
'Maintenance cost halved when you got infamy. Doubled if no infamy.'
'Crew requirements halved when you got infamy. Doubled if no infamy.'
'Research progress doubled when you got infamy. Halved if no infamy.'
'inactive Stations de recherche will automatically begin these projects'
'checked before every research cycle. No progress will get wasted'
'To scan ships in order to discover open ports, you need to use the commands added by a Hacking Rootkit.'

line.comment: * add custom dynamic menu item to array $menu: text='Apply port research to all Hacking stations' return value='applyAllPort'

line.text: 'Apply virus research to all Hacking stations'
'Apply worm research to all Hacking stations'
'An active defence program has already been launched at: '
'Launch a global active defense program for '

sval.val: Auto-mode allows to queue multiple research projects.
from lack of criminal connections (no infamy)
Port research makes secured ports vulnerable.
Backdoors can be installed with the Hacking Rootkit (manual) or Cyberwar perk (auto).
Your machine empire cannot conduct research anymore.
Appliquer à toutes les Stations de recherche
Appliquer à toutes les Stations de recherche (Mémoire non-terrienne)
on click > begin project in this station
on click > add project to global backlog
No Mémoire terrienne in this sector.
Milestone effects only apply to the current faction.
Extra maintenance cost (on top of higher base cost)
Needs extra Quantum Tubes but less Hull Plating and Computer Components
Needs fewer Quantum Tubes and Computer Components but more Hull Plating and Crystals
Always infected with OCV virus. Eventually turns on you and joins the Terraformers
Virus progression rate depends on abnormal signals in original construction sector
Cost discount based on abnormal signals in original construction sector
Research station bonus based on abnormal signals in the sector
Not attacked by Terraformers. Cannot attack Terraformers.
Needs extra Computer Components but less Hull Plating and Quantum Tubes
Maintenance cost halved when you got infamy. Doubled if no infamy.
Crew requirements halved when you got infamy. Doubled if no infamy.
Research progress doubled when you got infamy. Halved if no infamy.
inactive Stations de recherche will automatically begin these projects
checked before every research cycle. No progress will get wasted
To scan ships in order to discover open ports, you need to use the commands added by a Hacking Rootkit.
Apply virus research to all Hacking stations
Apply worm research to all Hacking stations
An active defence program has already been launched at:
Launch a global active defense program for
